Name: team_size_constraint
Description: A team must have between 3 and 9 members.

Name: project_budget_limit
Description: The total cost must not exceed the project budget.

Name: worker_assignment_limit
Description: A worker can be assigned to at most one team.

Name: sprint_effort_capacity
Description: Total effort of user stories in a sprint cannot exceed team velocity.

Name: blocker_status_for_task
Description: A task with a high-severity blocker cannot have status 'done'.

Name: feature_status_for_release
Description: A feature must be 'done' to be included in a release plan.

Name: required_skill_for_task
Description: A task requiring a specific skill must be assigned to a worker with that skill.

Name: scrum_master_per_team
Description: Each team must be assigned exactly one Scrum Master.

Name: unique_sprint_number
Description: The sprint number must be unique within a project.

Name: product_owner_for_backlog
Description: Every product backlog must be managed by one Product Owner.

Name: task_dependency
Description: A task cannot start before its prerequisite task is completed.

Name: release_plan_date
Description: The planned date for a release must be after the end date of all its included sprints.

Name: epic_story_containment
Description: An epic must contain at least one user story.
